title: Design and Implementation of Collaborative Learning Strategies in Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational technology theories and experience with digital learning platforms
context.additional_context: A course for in-service professionals to enhance specialized competencies in social science fields

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain the theoretical differences between collaborative learning and intergroup competitive learning
When designing collaborative learning in virtual learning platforms, learners can propose two or more strategies for regulating social interaction and cognitive conflict
Learners can design formative assessment tools to measure engagement levels of large learner groups in mobile microlearning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
